attributes.definition: A dataset that consists of numerical values, often organized in a tabular format, and is primarily used for statistical analysis and machine learning models.
attributes.simplified_explanation: A table of numbers used for math and AI.

extractions.extraction_text: If you took machine learning course, usually they assume the data already been convert into data matrix.

attributes.summary_of_insight: Machine learning courses often expect data to be in a matrix format.

extractions.extraction_text: So a lot of machine learning are starting from matrix operation.

attributes.summary_of_insight: Matrix operations are fundamental to many machine learning processes.

extractions.extraction_text: So then because of it, your data need to go through the preprocessing to convert them to corresponding data matrix.

attributes.summary_of_insight: Data must be preprocessed into a matrix format for machine learning.

extractions.extraction_text: They are not structured data. They can contain the paragraphs, sentences and words. In order for you to convert them to a matrix site, but then originally they are paragraph and the sentence and words.

attributes.definition: Unstructured data, such as paragraphs, sentences, and words, needs to be converted into a matrix format for certain analyses.
attributes.simplified_explanation: Text needs to be turned into numbers in a table before computers can do math or AI on it.

extractions.extraction_text: And they might need some natural language processing NLP technique for you to convert them.

attributes.definition: Techniques used to convert unstructured text data into a format suitable for analysis, such as a data matrix.
attributes.simplified_explanation: Special computer methods to understand and change human language into a format computers can use.

extractions.extraction_text: And like after 2013, we have large language model, we can utilize that way to convert to it.

attributes.definition: Advanced models, developed after 2013, that can be utilized for converting text data into matrix formats.
attributes.simplified_explanation: Powerful AI tools, created after 2013, that help turn text into usable data for computers.

attributes.definition: A special type of record, where Each record (transaction) involves a set of items.
attributes.simplified_explanation: Data where each entry is a collection of items, and the order of items within the collection doesn't matter.

extractions.extraction_text: Transaction data are particularly important if you want working with association rule, association rule.

attributes.summary_of_insight: Transaction data is crucial for analyzing association rules.

extractions.extraction_text: So for example, you went to 7-11, you purchase certain item. And those item will be keep in one transaction.

attributes.example_context: So for example, you went to 7-11, you purchase certain item. And those item will be keep in one transaction.
attributes.instructor_emphasis: Provides a relatable real-world scenario (shopping at 7-11) to explain transaction data.

extractions.extraction_text: We don't care about the order. So the bread, Coke, Milk, if you do Milk, Coke, Coke and Bread, they are the same. So then we don't care about order in transaction.

attributes.summary_of_insight: In transaction data, the order of items within a transaction is irrelevant.

attributes.definition: Data that represents entities and the relationships between them, forming a graph structure.
attributes.simplified_explanation: Data structured as nodes (entities) and edges (connections between entities), like social networks or web links.

attributes.definition: Data where the sequence or order of elements is significant.
attributes.simplified_explanation: Data where the order matters, such as time series or sequences.

The options are: "Consist of numerical values" (97% correct), "Often organized in a tabular format" (92% correct), "May contain unstructured text data" (8% correct), and "Primarily used for statistical analysis and machine learning models" (92% correct).
